text: Super Mario Advance (SMA) is a series of remasters of Mario games for Game Boy Advance. There are four games in the series: # Super Mario Advance, based off of Super Mario Bros. 2 # Super Mario Advance 2, based off of Super Mario World # Super Mario Advance 3, based off of Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island # Super Mario Advance 4, based off of Super Mario Bros. 3 Category:Mario video games
title: Super Mario Advance
